attributes.action: enact a law that stops any UK prime minister from being in office for more than 2 terms.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: No prime minister should retain the power of office for longer than 2 terms, I feel this would allow new blood to circulate through the government & fresh ideas to come to fruition. I know this is similiar to US policy & seems to work there. We have had many good prime ministers but when in office too long they seem to lose the feeling of the people
